Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the AION Home skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your AION Home devices by voice. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app to link your AION Home app account and discover your devices. 
Find more information about connecting smart home devices to Alexa at Connect Smart Home Devices to Alexa.
https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=G3RKPNRKF33ECTW7
If you face any problems discovering your AION Home devices, just say:
“Alexa, discover my devices.”
To use the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:
(1) Use the names that you previously set up. They're shown in the AION Home app and can be changed there.
(2) Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and then add the device to the group. 
More information is available at Create Smart Home Groups for Alexa.
https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GS8URL9U6PW8SPTA
After you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:
“Alexa, turn on Bedroom.”
“Alexa, open Livingroom Shutter.”
“Alexa, close Livingroom Shutter.”
If you have any questions, please visit the AION Home website at 
https://aion-innovations.com/
